Bash(gh release create v1.0.0 --title "NovelForge v1.0.0 - First Major Release" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
# NovelForge v1.0.0

A fully functional AI-powered novel generation platform.

## Key Features

- **Complete Novel Generation** - AI-powered chapter generation with progress tracking
- **In-Browser Reading** - Read your generated novels directly in the app
- **Multiple Export Formats** - Export to DOCX \(Microsoft Word\) and PDF
- **Story Bible Export** - Export character and world information
- **Character & World Management** - Track characters, locations, and world-building
- **Plot Structure** - Visual plot layer and act structure management
- **Coherence Tracking** - Monitor story consistency across chapters
- **Analytics** - Word count tracking and generation statistics
- **Originality Checking** - Plagiarism detection for generated content
- **Customization** - Set author name and book title for exports

## What''s New in This Release

This is the first stable, production-ready version of NovelForge, featuring:

- Working Read Novel and Export buttons
- Author name and book title editing on completion
- Fixed API endpoints for books and chapters
- Proper authentication on all API calls
- Direct export buttons on the progress page

## Rollback

To rollback to this version:
```bash
git checkout v1.0.0
```

---

Live site: https://novelforge.daleheenan.com
EOF
